# Chronicles of the Business Pathfinder

> This repository powers the "Chronicles of the Business Pathfinder" website, built using the Astrowind template (Astro + Tailwind CSS). It is production-ready, SEO-friendly, and features a blog, image optimization, analytics, and more.

This project leverages the Astrowind template for rapid, modern web development. The codebase is organized for clarity, scalability, and best practices, with a strong focus on documentation, configuration, and modular source code.
